name: Warmart (Warmart)
description:
WELCOME!  We are a small group of students from Barcelona developing WarMart. Our game is a local multiplayer set in a supermarket in which two players have to fight each other to see who can get  the whole grocery list in their shopping cart first.

Players can steal and throw items, run over their oponent with their shopping cart and basically do anything you can't (or shouldn't) do in a regular supermarket!

Good luck and take all you c(w)an(t)
